header_text: You present an idea for an event for your department. When you ask people what they think, one colleague raises their hand. They say that they "hate" the idea.

elements.text: While your colleague didn't express themselves in the best way, you realize that everyone is entitled to their own opinion. You feel proud anyway because you put yourself out...

elements.name: You present an idea for an event for your department. When you ask people what they think, one colleague raises their hand. They say that they "hate" the idea._Work/Career Development_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
